title: What's Chasing You
lyrics:
Too late, too late to tell you I’m gonna build a world around you
Too far, too far away for me to pull you in & show you just what I
Can do with a lover who tries
To bend with me too
What’s chasing you? Ooh-ooh-ooh oooh

What’s chasing you? Ooh-ooh-ooh oooh



I don’t understand a single word that you say

Baby are you talking to me?

Words that twist around a wire again make

You send through all your secrets to your heart (this line I’m not sure)



Oh-oh-ooh why

Do we do what we do when we lie?

We give shape to the struggle



What’s chasing you? Ooh-ooh-ooh oooh

What’s chasing you? Ooh-ooh-ooh oooh

Ooh-ooh-ooh oooh



Too late, too late to tell you I’m gonna build a world around you

Too far, you’re too far away for me to pull you in & show you just what I

I can do with a lover who tries

To bend with me too-ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh



What’s chasing you? Ooh-ooh-ooh oooh

What’s chasing you? Ooh-ooh-ooh oooh

What’s chasing you? Ooh-ooh-ooh oooh

Ooooh. Oooh-ooh-ooh oooh. Oooh-ooh
